sentences.sContent: They relied heavily on the advice of their professional advisers.
sentences.sCn: 他们非常依赖专业顾问的建议。

sentences.sContent: ...since these services rely on advertising revenue...
...these experiments rely on incentive payments to get doctors to try them...
...we rely on the unemployment figures and other statistics to frame our sense of reality...
...These facts prove that people rely on Chinese-made products...

...I'm hoping to get a better grip on some of the questions raised by the data revolution: In what situations should we rely on intuitive pattern recognition and in which situations should we ignore intuition and follow the data...

trans.tranCn: 依靠， 依赖； 信赖， 指望
trans.tranOther: If you rely on someone or something, you need them and depend on them in order to live or work properly
